languages.text: Офицеры, отправившиеся на сделку вместе с Маражаем, сообщают, что обмен прошел успешно. Некоторые несговорчивые ксеносы были против, но смертоносная рука Маражая лишила их жизни прежде, чем слова несогласных обрели вес.

traits.locale_text: Офицеры, отправившиеся на сделку вместе с Маражаем, сообщают, что обмен прошел успешно. Некоторые несговорчивые ксеносы были против, но смертоносная рука Маражая лишила их жизни прежде, чем слова несогласных обрели вес.

languages.text: Officers sent to oversee the trade alongside Marazhai report that the exchange was successful. Some uncooperative xenos were against it, but Marazhai's deadly hand took their lives before their arguments gained any weight.
languages.original_text: Офицеры, отправившиеся на сделку вместе с Маражаем, сообщают, что обмен прошел успешно. Некоторые несговорчивые ксеносы были против, но смертоносная рука Маражая лишила их жизни прежде, чем слова несогласных обрели вес.

Officers sent to oversee the trade alongside Marazhai report that the exchange was successful. Some uncooperative xenos were against it, but Marazhai's deadly hand took their lives before their arguments gained any weight.

languages.text: 与玛拉斋一起被派去监督交易的军官报告说，这场交易很成功。有几个异形不同意合作，但他们才刚刚提出反对观点，玛拉斋的致命之手便立刻夺走了他们的性命。
languages.original_text: Officers sent to oversee the trade alongside Marazhai report that the exchange was successful. Some uncooperative xenos were against it, but Marazhai's deadly hand took their lives before their arguments gained any weight.

traits.locale_text: 与玛拉斋一起被派去监督交易的军官报告说，这场交易很成功。有几个异形不同意合作，但他们才刚刚提出反对观点，玛拉斋的致命之手便立刻夺走了他们的性命。

languages.text: ママラズハイと一緒に貿易を監督するために派遣された士官は、交換が成功したと報告してきた。非協力的な異種族の中には反対する者もいたが、彼らの主張が重みを増す前にマラズハイの凶手が彼らの命を奪った。
languages.original_text: Officers sent to oversee the trade alongside Marazhai report that the exchange was successful. Some uncooperative xenos were against it, but Marazhai's deadly hand took their lives before their arguments gained any weight.

traits.locale_text: ママラズハイと一緒に貿易を監督するために派遣された士官は、交換が成功したと報告してきた。非協力的な異種族の中には反対する者もいたが、彼らの主張が重みを増す前にマラズハイの凶手が彼らの命を奪った。

languages.text: Los oficiales enviados a supervisar el intercambio junto a Marazhai informan de que el intercambio fue un éxito. Algunos xenos poco cooperativos se opusieron, pero la mano letal de Marazhai acabó con sus vidas antes de que sus argumentos cobraran peso.
languages.original_text: Officers sent to oversee the trade alongside Marazhai report that the exchange was successful. Some uncooperative xenos were against it, but Marazhai's deadly hand took their lives before their arguments gained any weight.

traits.locale_text: Los oficiales enviados a supervisar el intercambio junto a Marazhai informan de que el intercambio fue un éxito. Algunos xenos poco cooperativos se opusieron, pero la mano letal de Marazhai acabó con sus vidas antes de que sus argumentos cobraran peso.

languages.text: Die Offiziere, die Marazhai begleitet haben, um den Handel zu überwachen, berichten, dass der Austausch ein Erfolg war. Einige unkooperative Xenos waren dagegen, doch Marazhais tödliche Hand hat ihnen das Leben genommen, bevor ihre Argumente Gewicht annehmen konnten.
languages.original_text: Officers sent to oversee the trade alongside Marazhai report that the exchange was successful. Some uncooperative xenos were against it, but Marazhai's deadly hand took their lives before their arguments gained any weight.

traits.locale_text: Die Offiziere, die Marazhai begleitet haben, um den Handel zu überwachen, berichten, dass der Austausch ein Erfolg war. Einige unkooperative Xenos waren dagegen, doch Marazhais tödliche Hand hat ihnen das Leben genommen, bevor ihre Argumente Gewicht annehmen konnten.

languages.text: Les officiers chargés de superviser l'échange aux côtés de Marazhai rapportent que la transaction s'est déroulée comme prévu. Si quelques xénos ont tenté de s'y opposer, le Drukhari les a tués de ses mains avant que leurs arguments ne pèsent dans la balance.
languages.original_text: Officers sent to oversee the trade alongside Marazhai report that the exchange was successful. Some uncooperative xenos were against it, but Marazhai's deadly hand took their lives before their arguments gained any weight.

traits.locale_text: Les officiers chargés de superviser l'échange aux côtés de Marazhai rapportent que la transaction s'est déroulée comme prévu. Si quelques xénos ont tenté de s'y opposer, le Drukhari les a tués de ses mains avant que leurs arguments ne pèsent dans la balance.

languages.text: Marazhai ile birlikte takası denetlemek için gönderilen subaylar, değiş tokuşun başarılı geçtiğini rapor ediyor. İş birliği yapmak istemeyen zeno buna karşı çıksa da Marazhai'ın ölümcül eli, olayın büyümesine fırsat vermeden canlarını almış.
languages.original_text: Officers sent to oversee the trade alongside Marazhai report that the exchange was successful. Some uncooperative xenos were against it, but Marazhai's deadly hand took their lives before their arguments gained any weight.
